Desc.entry: An independent registered charity that raises, manages and distributes funds to support better health care for the people of Sheffield and the wider region. Has 3 on-going funding campaigns; The Sheffield Cystic Fibrosis Appeal, the South Yorkshire Heart Appeal and the Sheffield Leukaemia Appeal.
